name: Shore Up
description: You use the power of the earth around you to help heal your wounds, recovering 2d8 + MOVE hit points.Â  If used during a Sandstorm, your MOVE modifier is doubled.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
